name: Digital Marketing Manager / Communication & Outreach
description:
What do we do?

Improvado io is a rapidly-growing data-driven US startup funded by more than 60 well-known VCs and funds in Silicon Valley. We’ve managed to raise $9 million in investments and now we’re growing up to 300% annually, setting new sales records.

Our product is a cloud-based SaaS-platform for marketers that allows us to easily aggregate data from 180+ advertising platforms like Instagram, YouTube, Facebook Ads, and GA into one place. We automate up to 90% of manual work related to reporting. One and a half billion records a day pass through Improvado and the storage size reaches ten terabytes...that’s why we’re so focused on up-to-date, high-load technologies.

Our HQ is in Silicon Valley (San-Francisco) with engineering offices in Tomsk and Moscow and already work with huge enterprises from the USA, Europe, and Asia, like Adroll, ASUS, Monster Energy etc.

Our expertise in data aggregation has led our product to be high-ranked as a recommended middleware for marketers and data analysts (Yandex’s list for example). Due to our fast growth, we’re looking for the most talented engineers and other specialists able to contribute to our high-tech product development and to be a part of our cool international team.16:47

Our Marketing team is growing, and we’re searching for a person with fantastic communication skills willing to grow as a Digital Marketing Manager with a specialization in Communication & Outreach.
We are looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist with strong communication skills who will assist our internal team in content creation and distribution.


About you:

  • fluent communication skills
  • experience in the creation of the communication assets: either emails, social media posts, ads, or press releases
  • at least 1 year of experience in digital marketing
  • tech-savvy, fast, responsible, eager to learn
What you will do:
  • build relationships with the community of marketing influencers
  • conduct content research
  • assist in the creation of excellent content - you will work together with our content writer
  • learn how to handle the coolest content software
What you will not do:
  • Do work for the sake of doing it - each employee of our startup is working toward a common goal, and that goal is Growth. From the first day, our team will be working on communicating our big dream to you and making sure you can achieve your career goals with us;
  • Stay bored - we work on plenty of projects, and you’ll be able to dive deeper into activities related to different areas of marketing.

If you decided to apply for this job, please record 5 minutes intro about yourself, your experience, and why you think you would be an excellent fit for this job!
